title: Swain - The Dragon Master
body:
Hi guys, I'm neonir.

Once upon a time, I made a thread on the NA forums.

http://forums.na.leagueoflegends.com/board/showthread.php?t=1158089

This was many years ago now. Back in the oft forgotten days of yore, also known as 2011

I was but a boy, a boy with a dream of an old man who turns into a dragon and ruins peoples day.

It has come to my attention that, after all this time, after me leaving league, coming back, moving to the oce server, leaving again, forgetting about this idea, all of its support, forgetting about that dream and essentially giving up on the promises made.

Dragon master swain.... Soon.

This time, I just soiled myself.
